messages.subject: Re: Honesty (was Twisted Logic???)
messages.msgSnippet: Same here Nancy. My daughter and I were shunned from the local homeschooler s meetings when she was young. I DARED admit that I was not force-feeding math down
messages.messageBody:
Same here Nancy. My daughter and I were shunned from the local
homeschooler's meetings when she was young. I DARED admit that I was
not force-feeding math down her throat. They were appalled (while
their 3-year olds had pictures of aborted fetuses on their little
white t-shirts). This was in southern Louisiana and I was alone in
what I was doing the entire 18 years.

Unconventional RULES!

Valerie



--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., "Johanna" <saninocencio1@c...> wrote:
> Where you moving to Nancy, anywhere southern??
>
> Johanna
> Life is the ultimate learning experience!

> From: Nanci Kuykendall
> To: Unschooling-dotcom@y...

> Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Honesty (was Twisted Logic???)
>
>
> >Well, I guess I figure if I can't be myself with
> >unschoolers, there's
> >no hope for the world.
> >Juli
>
> Too True! I guess I suffer lately from living in an
> area where I don't have many friends because I am
> always myself. I am too shocking, or too
> unconventional or something for most folks around
> here. Thank goodness we are moving soon! I am
> getting lonely...
>
> Nanci K.
>

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Honesty (was Twisted Logic???)
messages.msgSnippet: Where you moving to Nancy, anywhere southern?? Johanna Life is the ultimate learning experience! ... From: Nanci Kuykendall To:
messages.messageBody:
Where you moving to Nancy, anywhere southern??

Johanna
Life is the ultimate learning experience!
----- Original Message -----
From: Nanci Kuykendall
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, April 28, 2001 3:06 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Honesty (was Twisted Logic???)


>Well, I guess I figure if I can't be myself with
>unschoolers, there's
>no hope for the world.
>Juli

Too True! I guess I suffer lately from living in an
area where I don't have many friends because I am
always myself. I am too shocking, or too
unconventional or something for most folks around
here. Thank goodness we are moving soon! I am
getting lonely...

Nanci K.
